actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the estate and gift taxes and the tax on generation-skipping transfers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the estate tax, the gift tax, and the tax on generation-skipping transfers.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the estate and gift taxes and the tax on generation-skipping transfers.
